tool_description: Adds degree markings and zodiac sign boundaries around the outer edge of the natal chart wheel.

show_sign_boundaries.description: Whether to show zodiac sign boundaries

major_tick_interval.description: Degree interval for major tick marks (5, 10, or 30)

error_messages: Invalid radius: Outer radius must be a positive number.
Invalid tick interval: Major tick interval must be 5, 10, or 30 degrees.
Missing chart center: Center coordinates are required for degree marking placement.
usage: Input chart dimensions from Chart Canvas Generator. Creates degree markings and sign boundaries around the chart perimeter.

major_ticks_count.description: Number of major degree tick marks created

minor_ticks_count.description: Number of minor degree tick marks created

sign_boundaries_drawn.description: Whether zodiac sign boundaries were drawn
